alert.note: Alert for Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 3:34PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Eastern Columbia County. In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous due to snow covered roadways and low visibility. Gusty winds will contribute to blowing and drifting of snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of one inch per hour are possible in the late morning into the afternoon on Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
